ygData.msgSnippet: Grimlock looks back down to the Minibot, and snorts, hot air whipping into Crossroads. Autobots always need Dinobots. he complained, turning to Snarl

Grimlock looks back down to the Minibot, and snorts, hot air whipping
into Crossroads. "Autobots always need Dinobots." he complained, turning
to Snarl (KSLAWDOGG). "You in charge of Dinobots, crush anything that
threatens us." Grimlock boasted, clanging one of his fists agains his
large chest. He then turned to Crossroads. "Well." he spat impatiantly.

Strafe nodded, "I think i've spotted the Decepticons." was all he said,
as he kept it short and sweet.

Hoist nodded, "Theyll be rolling soon sir." he said extatically,
stepping back, then his hood shifted up, as his arms foled back to his
sides, and neeled into his legs, as it turned into his wheels. He then
rolled towards the computer room.
